Key Match Events: Bangladesh won the match by 25 runs
Tanzid Hasan scored 35 runs off 26 balls
Shakib Al Hasan scored 64* runs off 46 balls
Michael Levitt was bowled by Taskin Ahmed for 18 runs
Max O'Dowd was bowled by Tanzim Hasan Sakib for 12 runs
Vikramjit Singh scored 26 runs off 16 balls
Sybrand Engelbrecht scored 33 runs off 22 balls
Scott Edwards was caught by Jaker Ali off Mustafizur Rahman for 25 runs
Bas de Leede was stumped by Litton Das off Rishad Hossain for 0 runs
Logan van Beek was caught by Rishad Hossain for 2 runs
Tim Pringle was bowled by Taskin Ahmed for 1 run
Aryan Dutt was not out for 15 runs
Shakib Al Hasan took 4 wickets for 29 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan was awarded the Player of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Arnos Vale Ground, Kingstown, St Vincent
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
The match was won by Bangladesh, earning them 2 points and putting them ahead in the standings
Others: The match was played on June 13, 2024
The umpires for the match were Chris Brown and Jayaraman Madanagopal
